channel.title: Best Website For RSPS Forums
channel.description:
Sorry if this is the wrong section but if it is don't spam the comments saying that it's in the wrong section, just let the staff move it please
As the title says, does anyone know a good forum making website that hosts for free?

item.title: Best Website For RSPS Forums
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Samih1996, post:10, topic:528160”][quote author=runekeepthug link=topic=646911.msg4353555#msg4353555 date=1377077492]
If your going to use a free webhost I would go with a free offshore hosting like http://www.hostinger.ph/

It might just be me but it seemed like everytime I used 000webhost or x10hosting for my Runescape Private Server Forum/Site they always suspended my account for copyright.
[/quote]
Hah really? 000webhost suspends your account for copyright but doesn’t reply for the ticket you open. awful service. I think paying is probably best, they are not actually that expensive.[/quote]
That’s weird. A company removing illegal content from their servers on the copyright owners request? I’ve NEVER heard of such a thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Website For RSPS Forums
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Samih1996, post:7, topic:528160”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=646911.msg4351421#msg4351421 date=1376704707]

enjin.com
webs.com

Top 2 that I would use.

Those websites belong here:
[/quote]

Your right on this one. If you want a Content Management System then those two sites are not the softwares to go for. I would say, buy a domain, get hosting and use WordPress on your web server.[/quote]
Or, you could just use 000webhost, x10hosting, or one of the 100’s of other free hosts that allow FTP, MySQL (Not remote), and such.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Website For RSPS Forums
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Pk6uhave2, post:2, topic:528160”]enjin.com
webs.com

Top 2 that I would use.[/quote]

Did you really just say Webs? o.O Oh my…

There isn’t really sites for ‘forum’ building. You get a website host and upload a forums engine to it (SMF, myBB, etc.) I’ve had wonderful outcomes with http://www.zymic.com … Amazing host capabilities and a nice cPanel layout.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Website For RSPS Forums
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

:palm: This thread. AGAIN. There’s been 3 or 4 threads asking this in the past week and a half, use the search bar.

i.e. https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,646782.msg4349690.html#msg4349690

Read full topic

item.title: Best Website For RSPS Forums
item.dc:creator: @Zeanr Zeanr
item.description:
@Zeanr wrote:

[quote=“Pk6uhave2, post:2, topic:528160”]enjin.com
webs.com

Top 2 that I would use.[/quote]

Whoa, Don’t use webs! What you could do and I’ll be happy to help you out. Is download a forum such as MyBB or SMF and upload it to a real webhost provider such as 000webhost, x10hosting, etcetera. This won’t take much time at all, maybe a total of 10 minutes.

Now, people have their personal opinions of which is better, I am not sure. I’ve always decided to go with SMF considering it’s very easy to setup + edit to your liking.

~Zeanr

Read full topic
